column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Scrumptious!    It is so popular you do have to wait.   Thanks to the recommendation of another Yelp user I used Yelp to get ourselves on the wait list.   On s Sunday morning at 10:30 I got on the wait list and the first time available was 12:50 pm.   So we went shopping and enjoyed the city until Wild berry texted us our table was ready.   This service worked great!
